item.title: Test Single Sign-On
item.description: Test Single Sign-On Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Describes how to test whether SSO is working for your app integration. Current source page is dimensioned by OIDC and SAML. Need to check if this still necessary for this section fo it. Links to original docs: ‘+ https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/add-private-app/ (Test your integration) Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
